frameDefinitions: A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
There is a gradable amount of light in a particular Location.
An Entity is judged by a sound Attribute of some perceived level of Volume intensity.
The lexical units in this frame are descriptions of a Cognizer's Attitude about or outlook on a State_of_affairs.     ''
These words describe the size of message that a Speaker is judged by a (usually unexpressed)
An Entity stands out perceptually in comparison to other members of its type.
frameExamples: Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
The small print was bearly readable by the light of the very <t>dim</t> torch.
Carl is becoming more <t>pessimistic</t> about the negotiations every day.
Graham is very shy with most people, but he gets very <t>chatty</t> with Mr. Roberts.
Pilot Mountain in NC is very <t>prominent</t>.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
The place whose amout of light is being described.  The <fen>Location</fen> can also be a location in time, as seen in the second example below:
The entity from which the light eminates.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the sound level <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under consideration. This role is incorporated in each LU in the frame.
A quantity or characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s sound output with repspect to its <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Volume</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Volume</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The place where an <fen>Entity</fen> is located.
The person whose <fen>Attitude</fen> about a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is being expressed.
The outlook or viewpoint expressed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
An event, topic, or situation about which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has an <fen>Attitude</fen>.
The Time interval during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the <fen>Attitude</fen> about the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
This is the person who is characterized as talkative, reticent etc.  It is usually the External Argument:

<fen>Text</fen> is rarely expressed because the quantity of information given is the focus of the frame, rather than the information content. Texts can occur as NP objects, but cannot be either direct quotes or complement clauses.
This role is the <fen>Topic</fen> on which much or little information is communicated. <fen>Topic</fen> is far more frequent than Message in this frame.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the saliency <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion, namely perceptual salience.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular salience.
This role refers to the location where the <fen>Entity</fen> has a prominence of some <fen>Attribute</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
She hid from the man in a dark <fex>corner</fex>.
A dim <fex>lamp</fex> swung over the entrance to the castle.
<fex>Americans</fex> are optimistic despite the climbing unemployment rate.
Michelle had a somewhat negative <fex>outlook</fex> on the direction her life was heading.
<fex>The economy</fex> looks quite grim at this moment.
<fex>Pat</fex> has been silent on this issue.
Kim is very talkative <fex>about her family and childhood</fex>.
If you are asked to search for the plus sign with red-vertical and green-horizontal elements, <fex>all the red and green plus signs</fex> may seem to become salient.
The diagram, (a frequency distribution chart) shows a <fex>prominently</fex> conspicuous region of stars that extend from the extremely bright and hot stars to the faint and cool variety.
The affection for American culture seemed more prominent <fex>last year</fex>.
